Pre-Game Insights: Jeakson Singh Thounaojam is back in the national team after a six-month absence due to injury.

He has played a pivotal role for the Blue Tigers in the last two years, featuring in 17 consecutive matches from the AFC Asian Cup Qualifiers in June 2022 until the King's Cup in Thailand in September 2023.
Jeakson was a big miss for the squad in the AFC Asian Cup Qatar 2023.
He is excited to rejoin the national team for the FIFA World Cup Qualifiers against Afghanistan.
The Blue Tigers have had four full training sessions in preparation for the match on March 21.
